title: "Conversations with AI models can help create microprocessing chips, researchers discover"
excerpt: "Researchers at NYU Tandon School of Engineering have fabricated a microprocessing chip using plain English \"conversations\" with an AI model, a first-of-its-kind achievement that could lead to faster chip development and allow individuals without specialized technical skills to design chips."
